data.title: Better than Starbucks!
data.text: It was hard not to want to try this place because of all the billboard advertisement around Michigan. Being from Ohio, I had never heard of this place before but when I saw that they had peppermint mocha, of course my "inner typical white girl" came out (please no one get offended, it's ONLY A JOKE!). The inside was super quaint and cute. There were little coffee cups and travel mugs places around the store. Coffee was VERY reasonably priced! Definitely cheaper than Starbucks for a frozen drink. The baristas were also super friendly! Double bonus!

data.title: Love the free refill
data.text:
he Service: Very friendly! Many local people spending hours there using computer or just hanging out. Many seating. Staffs constantly keeping the store clean.

The Coffee: regular coffee (5 different flavor). 1st refill free!! Self-served. Largest cup only $2.75. They also sell specialty coffee too. 

The Parking: Plaza parking

data.title: Smoothies Galore
data.text: Great smoothies which are perfect for the summer, coupons available online. Staff is always friendly and helpful. Great local coffee shop.

data.title: Good coffee. Terrible service
data.text:
The Creme Brulé coffee is a treat but it is a typical, yuppie coffee shop. 

I was extremely disappointed in the staff this morning when and obviously disabled individual attempted to come into the store and he had difficulty with the door. When I heard the commotion of him trying to maneuver the door, the young girl at the register also looked and snickered. I am extremely ashamed of her actions. I will never go back

data.title: Loving the fresh decaf.
data.text: Bigby has a fabulous decaf hazelnut coffee. I'm not a coffee drinker except for this one. Coffee is always fresh and flavor enhancers such as vanilla and cinnamon are available. Bigby is a great, Michigan based alternative that bests the national chains.

data.title: I LIKE IT HOT!
data.text: Mike, the Owner, is always there in the mornings (maybe he skips out a few mornings at Golf Season)  to make sure the line is never long so you can get in and out quick.  There are always two containers of all flavors of his coffee so you don't have to wait but, if you want to meet friends or business associates, it is a nice environment.  For us frequent goers, he keeps your cards on file so you don't have to carry it with you for your free coffee after I think 12 visits.  Nice, friendly staff welcomes you.  Make sure you stop in to see them at Novi Road and Grand River!

data.title: Pretty good.  Could offer stronger coffee & 12 oz size
data.text: Not bad.   Have other coffee places we like better, though.  More sugar free flavor choices.     Is a friendly place.

data.title: Good Coffee
data.text: I like to visit Biggby Coffee in Novi to sit and organize my business and life. It is quiet, clean and the staff are friendly. They also have coffee in mugs which is so much better than paper cups.

data.title: COFFEE IS ON!
data.text: Never have to wait for fresh, hot coffee and lots of smiling faces behind the counter, your free coffee after 12 purchases is always a nice bonus!  Owner Mike is usually there to say HI!

data.title: ゆったり過ごせます
data.text: 平日の午後は、パソコンで仕事や勉強している人が多く、比較的静かです。コンセントもあり、また、窓が大きいのでゆっくり過ごすのに最適です。
